tags: Bidding open for SMART SOLUTION PARTNER members only.
full_summary:
*Title*
Filter Elements for Reverse Osmosis 
=====================================================

Government Tender Notification
-----------------------------

The Department of National Defence is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a contract to supply Filter Elements for Reverse Osmosis. The contract involves the delivery of two types of filter elements to the Canadian Forces Bases (CFBs) at Esquimalt and Halifax.

### Contract Details

* **Contract Number:** W8482-241974/A
* **Publication Date:** August 23, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 3, 2023, 2:00:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** December 15, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 29, 2024

### Items to be Supplied

The contract involves the delivery of filter elements for reverse osmosis, as detailed below:

* **Item 1:**
	+ Quantity: 200
	+ Unit of Issue: Each (EA)
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt
* **Item 2:**
	+ Quantity: 300
	+ Unit of Issue: EA
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Halifax

Reverse osmosis filter elements to be delivered meet the requirements specified by the Department of National Defence. Supplpliers will be expected to provide the NCAGE code for their products.

### Substitution of Products

Bidders may propose substitute products to meet the requirements of the contract. Any equivalent products must be clearly identified with their brand name, model, and NCAGE code.

### Currency and Payment

Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Offers submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

### Language and Documents

Documents submitted in either English or French will be accepted.

### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns about this RFP, please contact Jean-Pierre Normandin at the following:

* **Email:** jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (819) 939-3674

Download the full RFP document from the following link:

* **English:** [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8366/rfp-w8482-241974-a-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8366/rfp-w8482-241974-a-en.pdf)
